titleStmt.title: Articles set downe by the right worshipfull Thomas Randolph Esquier, Master and comptroller generall of all her Maiesties postes, and straightly by him commanded to be kept by the postes from London, to the northerne borders against Scotland, for the better obseruation, and due execution of such orders, as lately were appointed by the Lords of ther Maiesties priuie councill
